1.title: Return to Bethlehem
1.keyEvent: Naomi and Ruth return to Bethlehem after famine

2.title: Ruth Gleans in Field
2.keyEvent: Ruth gleans in Boaz's field and gains favor

3.title: Ruth's Proposal
3.keyEvent: Ruth approaches Boaz on the threshing floor

4.title: Boaz Redeems Ruth
4.keyEvent: Boaz redeems Ruth and they marry
